sense.def:
A suggestion
je zamisel ali načrt, ki ga povemo drugim, da bi ga pretehtali.

seg.quote: I made a few suggestions about how we could spend the afternoon.

sense.def:
A suggestion of something
je majhno znamenje nečesa.

seg.quote: He replied to her question with the merest suggestion of a smile.

sense.def:
Suggestion
je vplivanje na ljudi, da začnejo misliti tako, kot želimo mi.

seg.quote: Such is the power of suggestion that within two minutes the patient is asleep.
